content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-20, -70)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-20.0, -70.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at position (-18.0, -70.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) connected to a transport belt network and a wooden chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing copper ore
- Transport belt network connecting the mining drill to the furnaces

### Iron Plate Storage Facility at Position (-16.5, -64.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) storing iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -64.5) transferring items from a stone furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0) to the wooden chest

### Iron Ore Mining Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore
- Transport belt network connecting the mining drill to a wooden chest at position (-12.5, -54.5) storing iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) transferring items from the transport belt to the wooden chest

### Miscellaneous Storage Facility at Position (1.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) storing coal, iron ore, and iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) transferring items between wooden chests

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using transport belts
- Ensure that the start and end positions for connecting transport belts are valid and not `NoneType`. This will prevent the `AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'tile_dimensions'` from occurring.
- Double-check the connectivity of transport belts to ensure they are properly linked and functional.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement to avoid conflicts with existing entities.
